<<<<<<< HEAD
A caueat for the Christians agaynst the arch-papist
[40] p.
In Foster lane by [N. Hill for] Iohn Wally, [Imprynted at London : [1548]]
Place of publication and publisher's name from colophon; actual printer's name and publication date from STC. Title page border (McKerrow and Ferguson 33) has initials "J W" in the slot in the sill. Signatures: A-B C⁴. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======

In Foster lane by [N. Hill for] Iohn Wally, [Imprynted at London : [1548]]
Place of publication and publisher's name from colophon; actual printer's name and publication date from STC. Title page border (McKerrow and Ferguson 33) has initials "J W" in the slot in the sill. Signatures: A-B C⁴. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
] Iohn Wally
[N. Hill
